text: I don't think the cookie banner is in an iframe
correct, css should work. I believe HubSpot has some items that are set up in a setting thing
True true, you can add site wide css and html here: `<https://app.HubSpot.com/settings/{portalid}/website/pages/all-domains/page-templates>`
Obviously replace "{portalid}" with your portal id

As for your initial problem <@U0433N4REBU> Iâ€™m not sure I understand what you are talking about or asking about.

Can you try reasking the question and be a bit more clear?
